public: static property System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength SizeToCells { System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示基于单元格的自动调整大小模式的 结构。

span.span: Gets a structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

value.span: 表示基于单元格的自动调整大小模式的 结构。

span.span: A structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于单元格的自动调整大小模式大小列基于在列中，不包括列标题单元格的内容。The cell-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of cells in the column, not including column headers. 此大小调整模式将导致列展开如果内容大于当前的列大小滚动到视图。This sizing mode will cause columns to expand if content that is larger than the current column size is scrolled into view. 内容滚动到视图后，不会缩小列。The column will not shrink after the content is scrolled out of view.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SizeToHeader As DataGridLength
public: static property System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength SizeToHeader { System::Windows::Controls::DataGridLength get(); };

value.span: 表示基于标题的自动调整大小模式的 结构。

span.span: A structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头基于自动调整大小模式大小列基于列标头的内容。The header-based automatic sizing mode sizes columns based on the contents of column headers only.
